attributes.action: Equality for the GSCE English Language exam 2012 - For pupils in England
attributes.additional_details: This petition is for equality for all students.  At the moment students who live in England are not being given the same opportunity to have their English Language GCSE exam remarked under the same rules as Welsh students. We congratulate the Welsh Assembly for intervening in this political fiasco. English students are being discriminated against, and the British Government should challenge and intervene now for this year’s English students.
